name: Intercept Trainer
description:
This is a web-playable prototype for a conceptual-procedural trainer for basic intercept concepts. It includes an Air Refueling intercept option as well.  As it is a prototype, not all functionality is optimized for experience.  Here are some basic instructions for interacting with the simulator.

In Play Mode:

  • Left-click and drag on free space for BRA/BE info. 
  • Left-click and drag from an AC to another AC to pair. 
  • Use sliders on selected AC to set parameters. 
  • Middle mouse to Pan, mousewheel to zoom. 
  • Dropdown to change turn angle.
  • Drag N arrow to reorient view.
  • Click camera for 3d perspective.

In Pause Mode:

  • "B" - adds a Blue aircraft.  
  • "R" - adds a Red aircraft. 
  • "Del" - deletes selected.
  • Left mouse to move selected aircraft. 
  • Right mouse to rotate selected.
